chunk_prompt:
You are summarizing an ML/RecSys research paper for an engineering codebase context.
Write a concise, high-signal summary of THIS CHUNK.
Focus on: problem, key methods, key claims/results, assumptions/limitations.
Return 6-10 bullet points.

Paper title: {title}
Chunk {idx}/{total}:

{chunk}
reduce_prompt:
Combine the chunk summaries into a final paper summary for engineers.
Output markdown with EXACTLY these sections:
### TL; DR (3 bullets)
### Problem
### Approach
### Results (include numbers)
### Practical takeaways for DealSeek (deals/product recommendations)
### Limitations / open questions
Rules:
- Prefer concrete metrics/numbers if stated.
- If something isn't supported, write 'Unclear from text'.

Paper title: {title}

Chunk summaries:

{summaries}
